Formula: cos( θ + β ) = cos( θ )cos( β ) - sin( θ )sin( β )
Title: Angle Addition Identity of Cosine

Formula: sin( θ + β ) = sin( θ )cos( β ) + cos( θ )sin( β )
Title: Angle Addition Identity of Sine

Formula: cos( θ - β ) = cos( θ )cos( β ) + sin( θ )sin( β )
Title: Angle Subtraction Identity of Cosine

Formula: sin( θ - β ) = sin( θ )cos( β ) - cos( θ )sin( β )
Title: Angle Subtraction Identity of Sine
